002716.SZ.long_name: Chenzhou City Jingui Silver Industry Co., Ltd.
002716.SZ.summary: Chenzhou City Jingui Silver Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, smelting, processing, and export of silver in China. It primarily offers high-purity silver and silver products, high-purity silver nitrates, electrolytic leads, crude leads, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Chenzhou, China.
